qas.question: Which publication is considered the most impressive metaphysical text?
Who thought Process and Reality was little-read because the reader has to separate them from normal thought?
What philosophy in the west was challenged by Whitehead?
What was Whitehead's philosophy able to anticipate for the 21st century?
What was the outcome of anticipating the scientific and philosophical problems Whitehead proposed?
How has "Process and Reality" been described?

answers.text: "arguably the most impressive single metaphysical text of the twentieth century,"

qas.question: What did Isabelle Stengers say is the reason that "Process and Reality" is not commonly read and understood?

answers.text: it demands – as Isabelle Stengers puts it – "that its readers accept the adventure of the questions that will separate them from every consensus."

qas.question: What effect did Whitehead have on the future of metaphysics?

answers.text: he managed to anticipate a number of 21st century scientific and philosophical problems and provide novel solutions.

plausible_answers.text: most impressive single metaphysical text of the twentieth century

qas.question: How has "Process and Reality" been rejected?

plausible_answers.text: readers accept the adventure of the questions that will separate them from every consensus

context: Wieman's words proved prophetic. Though <a0_0><b11_0>Process and Reality<b11_0/><a0_0/> has been called <a5_0>"arguably the <b8_0>most impressive single metaphysical text of the twentieth century<b8_0/>,"<a5_0/> it has been little-read and little-understood, partly because <a6_0>it demands – as <a1_0>Isabelle Stengers<a1_0/> puts it – "that its <b9_0>readers accept the adventure of the questions that will separate them from every consensus<b9_0/>."<a6_0/> Whitehead questioned western philosophy's most dearly held assumptions about <a2_0>how the universe works<a2_0/>, but in doing so <a7_0>he managed to anticipate a number of <b10_0>21st century <a3_0>scientific and philosophical problems<b10_0/><a3_0/> and provide <a4_0>novel solutions<a4_0/>.
